price: -(មានគេនិយាយទៅកាន់ពួកគេថា) នេះហើយជានរក ដែលពួកអ្នកធ្លាប់បានបដិសេធនឹងវា(នៅក្នុងលោកិយ)។
arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi al-nāru allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
